name: Viet nam
startIntroPart1: Vietnam has the right to enjoy freedom and independence, and in fact has become a free and independent country. The entire Vietnamese nation is determined to use all its spirit and strength, life and wealth to maintain that freedom and independence!TBD
startIntroPart2: We believe that all people are born with equal rights. They are endowed by their creator with inalienable rights; Among these are the right to life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness
declaringWar: This war is inevitable and we will fight to the end!
attacked: We are willing to sacrifice to protect our independence!
defeated: You cannot win the whole nation. This is not the end.
introduction: Hello, I'm Ho Chi Minh, the leader of Vietnam. We come in good faith, and so should you.
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
afterPeace: I am glad the war is finally over.
